participant_1.background:
I remember buying my first house with my husband.
i love cold weather.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day.
i m a drummer in an indie band.

participant_2.background:
I often spend hours researching vintage cars online.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I enjoy the quiet solitude of my life on the farm.
some jokes go too far.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to drink chocolate milk and research vintage cars! What about you?
I love playing drums in my band and spending time on my farm.
That sounds really fun! I love the quiet solitude of the farm.
Me too, it's so peaceful and relaxing. I used to play the piano but had to stop because caffeine makes my hands shake.
That's too bad! I love playing the piano, it's so therapeutic.
It really is, I miss it a lot.
Well, if you ever want to play together let me know!
Great! What kind of music do you play?
Oh cool, I love indie rock!
We're actually playing a show this weekend if you want to come!
That sounds awesome, I'll definitely try to make it!
Great! It will be a lot of fun.
